# Preface {-}

```{r databrary_logo_img, fig.link='https://databrary.org', echo=FALSE}

```

This book describes how to use the Databrary data library.

```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')
```

# About the Authors {-}

Rick Gilmore is Professor of Psychology at Penn State and is the Co-Founder and Co-Director of Databrary.

Andrea Seisler manages the Brain and Behavioral Dynamics Laboratory at Penn State and is the Authorizations and Support Specialist for Databrary.

Melody Xu was a User Support Specialist at Databrary until she began a PhD program at Johns Hopkins University in August 2023.

Yinghe Liu works as a research assitance. He contributes to improving the Databrary Guideline Porject in FAll 2023.
